Superheroes.Name: Superman
Superheroes.Powers: Fly, Super Strength, Invulnerability, super speed, x-ray vision, freeze breath, heat vision, FLYYYYYYY
Superheroes.Occupation: Journalist, Reporter for the Daily Planet
Superheroes.Fun fact: He can hold his breath for an unlimited amount of time in space, but he still 'pretends' to breathe to blend in

Superheroes.Name: Batman
Superheroes.AKA: Dark Knight, Caped Crusader, Matches Malone
Superheroes.Powers: Exceptional martial artist, combat strategy, inexhaustible wealth, brilliant deductive skill, advanced technology
Superheroes.Fun fact: He often sabotages his own happiness because he fears losing loved ones like he lost his parents

Superheroes.Name: Green Arrow
Superheroes.Powers: Archery, unrivaled aim, exceptional martial artist, inexhaustible wealth
Superheroes.Fun fact: He once accidentally shot Batman (non-lethally) with an arrow

Superheroes.Name: Aquaman
Superheroes.Powers: Super strength, durability, control over sea life, exceptional swimming ability, breathe underwater
Superheroes.Fun fact: He once punched Superman so hard that it stunned him

Superheroes.Name: Nightwing
Superheroes.Powers: Exceptional martial artist, brilliant deductive skills, gymnastic ability, peak agility, combat skill, customized weapons
Superheroes.Fun fact: He once had a pet dog named 'Haley' named after Haley's Circus, where he grew up

Superheroes.Name: Flash
Superheroes.AKA: Scarlet Speedster, The Fastest Man Alive
Superheroes.Powers: Super speed, intangibility, superhuman agility, time travel, creates and controls lightning, multiversal knowledge
Superheroes.Occupation: Forensic scientist for the Central City Police Department
Superheroes.Fun fact: He once outran instant teleportation by running so fast he arrived before the teleportation effect finished

SuperVillians.Name: Lex Luthor
SuperVillians.Secret Identity: None, publicy known as Lex Luthor
SuperVillians.Powers: Genius intellect, master strategist, advanced technology, wealth, power armor
SuperVillians.Fun fact: He once became President of the United States

SuperVillians.Name: Joker
SuperVillians.AKA: The Clown Prince of Crime, The Harlequin of Hate
SuperVillians.Powers: Complete unpredictability, chaos agent, customized weapons, wields toxin which causes victims to die laughing
SuperVillians.Net Worth: inconsistent—sometimes he’s flat broke, other times he steals millions from banks or the mob
SuperVillians.Fun fact: His laugh changes depending on his mood

SuperVillians.Name: Merlyn
SuperVillians.Powers: Master archer, expert assassin, skilled in hand-to-hand combat, tactical genius
SuperVillians.Fun fact: He once beat Green Arrow in a contest before turning to villainy

SuperVillians.Name: Black Manta
SuperVillians.Powers: Genius intellect, master diver, expert combatant, advanced technology, lethal weaponry

SuperVillians.Name: Deathstroke
SuperVillians.Powers: Enhanced strength, speed, agility, durability, intellect, master tactician, expert marksman, peak human conditioning
SuperVillians.Fun fact: He has a regenerative healing factor, but it doesn’t heal his missing eye

SuperVillians.Name: Reverse-Flash
SuperVillians.Powers: Super speed (via Negative Speed Force), time travel, enhanced reflexes, phasing, accelerated healing
SuperVillians.Fun fact: He once erased himself from existence but still somehow kept coming back
